actionsOrientation.description: Controls how buttons are laid out

buttonSpacing.description: Controls how much spacing to use between buttons

iconPlacement.description: Controls where to place the action icon

maxActions.description: Controls how many actions are allowed in total

preExpandSingleShowCardAction.description: Controls whether to pre-expand single show card actions

spacing.description: Controls overall spacing of action element

allowCustomStyle.description: Controls whether custom styling is allowed

ContainerStylesConfig.description: Controls styling for default and emphasis containers

accent.description: Container style to use for accent

attention.description: Container style to use for attention

emphasis.description: Container style to use for emphasis

good.description: Container style to use for good

warning.description: Container style to use for warning

ErrorMessageConfig.description: Controls styling for input error messages

size.description: Font size to use for the error message

spacing.description: Amount of spacing to be used between input and error message

weight.description: Font weight that should be used for error messages

FactSetTextConfig.description: Parameters controlling the display of text in a fact set

color.description: Color of font for fact set text

fontType.description: Font Type for fact set text

isSubtle.description: Indicates if fact set text should be subtle

maxWidth.description: Maximum width of fact set text

size.description: Size of font for fact set text

weight.description: Weight of font for fact set text

wrap.description: Indicates if fact set text should wrap

default.description: Color to use when displaying default text

subtle.description: Color to use when displaying subtle text

FontSizesConfig.description: Controls font size metrics for different text styles

choiceSetInputValueSeparator.description: Separator to use when displaying multiple values for a `ChoiceSet`

fontFamily.description: Font face to use when rendering text

imageBaseUrl.description: Base URL to be used when loading resources

supportsInteractivity.description: Control whether interactive `Action`s are allowed to be invoked

maxImageHeight.description: Constrain image height to this value

isSubtle.description: Whether the label should be displayed using a lighter weight font

suffix.description: Suffix that should be appended to labels of this type

weight.description: Font weight that should be used for this type of label

InputsConfig.description: Controls display and behavior of Input types

inputSpacing.description: Amount of spacing to be used between label and input

MediaConfig.description: Controls the display and behavior of `Media` elements

allowInlinePlayback.description: Whether to display media inline or invoke externally

defaultPoster.description: URI to image to display when play button hasn't been invoked

playButton.description: Image to display as play button

lineColor.description: Color to use when drawing separator line

actionMode.description: Controls how the card is displayed. Note: Popup show cards are not recommended for cards with input validation, and may be deprecated in the future.

inlineTopMargin.description: Amount of margin to use when displaying the card

SpacingsConfig.description: Controls how elements are to be laid out

headingLevel.description: When displaying a `TextBlock` element with the `heading` style, this is the heading level exposed to accessibility tools.

TextStyleConfig.description: Sets default properties for text of a given style

color.description: Default font color for text of this style

fontType.description: Default font type for text of this style

isSubtle.description: Whether text of this style should be subtle by default

size.description: Default font size for text of this style

weight.description: Default font weight for text of this style

TextStylesConfig.description: Sets default properties for text of a given style
